author: khansen00
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
uninstall a alpha.10 release 

Expected behavior
-----------------
expected path is completely removed

Actual behavior
---------------
empty folder remains

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Could you test with the latest version 13?
I uninstall Alfa.13 without problem.

title: .msi uninstall leaves an empty version folder and start menu entry (for alpha.10)
